lesson.title: Your On-Chain Identity
lesson.objective: Understand wallet addresses and on-chain profiles

sections.content: In DeFi, your wallet address IS your identity. Unlike traditional finance where you need ID documents and bank approvals, a wallet address lets you interact with any protocol instantly. It's pseudonymous (not tied to your real name), portable (works across all chains), and truly owned by you.
Creating an on-chain profile registers your presence in the protocol. This timestamp becomes the start of your journey - every achievement, every milestone, measured from this moment.

content: Your wallet address is a 42-character hexadecimal string starting with 0x
Private key = ownership. Never share it. Ever.
On-chain profiles are permanent and transparent
Your journey timestamp starts when you register

questions.question: What makes a wallet address different from a bank account?
options: It requires government ID to open
It's owned and controlled entirely by you
It only works with one protocol

unlockHint: Create your on-chain profile to begin your journey
nextSteps: Your profile is now live. In 15 days, you can claim FIRST_STEPS.
